#A brief description on usage of TimThumb

= Introduction =

How to install and use TimThum


= Details =

TimThumb should be uploaded to a folder on your site. Any folder is fine. In the folder holding TimThumb create a cache folder and give it the permissions 777. This folder will hold the image cache.

Access the file with the following parameters...

* src: location of file from doc root
* w: width
* h: height
* zc: zoom crop (0 or 1)
* q: quality (default is 75 and max is 100)
